name: Elemental Storm
base_effect: Create a cataclysmic storm at target location dealing Magic Damage every second for 7 seconds. Element type depends on equipped staff: Fire deals additional damage, Ice immobilizes, Lightning concusses.

name: Elemental Rage
base_effect: Create a cataclysmic storm dealing Magic Damage every second for 9 seconds with increased radius. Fire deals additional damage, Ice immobilizes, Lightning concusses.

name: Eye of the Storm
base_effect: Storm is centered on you and moves with you dealing Magic Damage every second for 7 seconds. Fire deals additional damage, Ice immobilizes, Lightning concusses.

name: Force Shock
base_effect: Focus all elements into a single attack dealing Magic Damage. Combines Flame, Frost, and Shock damage types for 33% each.

name: Crushing Shock
base_effect: Focus all elements dealing Magic Damage. Interrupts casting enemies, putting them Off Balance. Combines Flame, Frost, and Shock damage types.

name: Force Pulse
base_effect: Focus all elements dealing Magic Damage. Splashes to nearby enemies dealing additional damage. Combines Flame, Frost, and Shock damage types.

name: Wall of Elements
base_effect: Create elemental wall dealing Magic Damage every second for 8 seconds. Fire burns, Frost reduces movement speed, Lightning applies Concussed.

name: Unstable Wall of Elements
base_effect: Create elemental wall dealing Magic Damage every second for 8 seconds. Explodes at end of duration dealing additional damage. Fire burns, Frost slows, Lightning concusses.

name: Elemental Blockade
base_effect: Create elemental wall dealing Magic Damage every second for 10 seconds with extended duration. Fire burns, Frost slows, Lightning concusses.

name: Destructive Touch
base_effect: Blast enemy with element dealing Magic Damage. Fire knocks back, Frost immobilizes, Lightning stuns.

name: Destructive Clench
base_effect: Blast enemy dealing Magic Damage. Fire deals DoT and knocks back, Frost grants damage shield and immobilizes, Lightning stuns and applies Minor Vulnerability.

name: Destructive Reach
base_effect: Blast enemy from extended range dealing Magic Damage. Fire knocks back, Frost immobilizes, Lightning stuns.

name: Weakness to Elements
base_effect: Afflict enemy with elemental weakness applying Major Breach reducing Spell Resistance for 25 seconds.

name: Elemental Susceptibility
base_effect: Apply Major Breach reducing Spell Resistance for 25 seconds. Also applies Minor Magickasteal allowing allies to restore Magicka on damage.

name: Elemental Drain
base_effect: Apply Major Breach reducing Spell Resistance for 24 seconds at no cost. Also applies Minor Magickasteal allowing allies to restore Magicka on damage.

name: Impulse
base_effect: Release burst of elemental energy dealing Magic Damage to all nearby enemies. Fire burns, Frost chills, Lightning concusses.

name: Elemental Ring
base_effect: Release elemental burst dealing Magic Damage and leaving fire ring dealing additional damage over 8 seconds. Fire burns, Frost chills, Lightning concusses.

name: Pulsar
base_effect: Release elemental burst dealing Magic Damage and applying Minor Mangle reducing Max Health by 10% for 6 seconds. Fire burns, Frost chills, Lightning concusses.

name: Tri Focus
base_effect: Fire Staff Heavy Attacks deal additional 6/12% splash damage. Frost Staff Heavy Attacks grant damage shield. Lightning Staff Heavy Attacks deal damage in area.

name: Penetrating Magic
base_effect: Destruction Staff abilities ignore 3/6% of enemy Spell Resistance.

name: Elemental Force
base_effect: Destruction Staff abilities apply status effects 100/200% more often.

name: Ancient Knowledge
base_effect: Fire Staff increases single target damage by 5/10%. Frost Staff reduces damage taken by 5/10%. Lightning Staff increases AoE damage by 5/10%.

name: Destruction Expert
base_effect: Killing an enemy with Destruction Staff ability restores 2000/3500 Magicka.

name: Panacea
base_effect: Channel healing energy to you and nearby allies healing every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. While channeling you cannot move or use abilities.

name: Life Giver
base_effect: Channel healing energy healing every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. Also casts Regeneration, Blessing of Protection, and Steadfast Ward on allies automatically.

name: Light's Champion
base_effect: Instantly heal nearby allies. Grants Major Force increasing Critical Damage by 20% and Major Protection reducing damage taken by 10% for 8 seconds.

name: Grand Healing
base_effect: Create circle of healing at target location healing allies every second for 3 seconds.

name: Illustrious Healing
base_effect: Create larger circle of healing at target location healing allies every second for 4 seconds with increased radius and duration.

name: Healing Springs
base_effect: Create circle of healing at target location healing allies every second for 3 seconds. Reduced cost and restores Magicka per ally healed.

name: Regeneration
base_effect: Share regenerative energies with up to 2 nearby allies healing over 10 seconds. Targets lowest health allies.

name: Rapid Regeneration
base_effect: Share regenerative energies with up to 2 nearby allies healing faster over 8.5 seconds with same total healing. Targets lowest health allies.

name: Radiating Regeneration
base_effect: Share regenerative energies with up to 6 nearby allies healing over 10 seconds. Targets lowest health allies.

name: Blessing of Protection
base_effect: Slam staff down blessing allies in front of you healing them and granting Minor Resolve increasing armor for 8 seconds.

name: Blessing of Restoration
base_effect: Slam staff down healing allies in cone with increased healing and granting Minor Resolve. Also restores Stamina and Magicka to allies.

name: Combat Prayer
base_effect: Slam staff down healing allies in cone and granting Minor Resolve, Minor Berserk increasing damage done by 5%, and Minor Courage increasing Weapon and Spell Damage.

name: Steadfast Ward
base_effect: Create damage shield for 6 seconds. Shield strength scales inversely with current Health absorbing more damage at lower Health.

name: Ward Ally
base_effect: Create damage shield on ally for 6 seconds. Also grants half-strength shield to yourself. Shield strength scales inversely with Health.

name: Healing Ward
base_effect: Create damage shield for 6 seconds. When shield expires heals based on shield strength remaining. Shield strength scales inversely with Health.

name: Force Siphon
base_effect: Siphon enemy health for 20 seconds. You and allies heal when damaging the target. Applies Minor Lifesteal.

name: Siphon Spirit
base_effect: Siphon enemy for 20 seconds. Applies Minor Lifesteal and also Minor Magickasteal and Minor Expedience allowing resource recovery.

name: Quick Siphon
base_effect: Siphon enemy for 20 seconds applying Minor Lifesteal. Increased healing from lifesteal effect. You and allies heal when damaging the target.

name: Essence Drain
base_effect: Fully-charged Heavy Attacks restore 330/660 additional Magicka to you and nearby allies.

name: Restoration Expert
base_effect: Increases healing done on targets under 30% Health by 6/12%.

name: Cycle of Life
base_effect: Restoration Staff abilities cost 3/6% less when you are above 50% Magicka. Abilities heal for 3/6% more when below 50% Magicka.

name: Absorb
base_effect: Blocking a spell attack restores 140/280 Magicka. Occurs once per second.

name: Restoration Master
base_effect: Increases healing done with Restoration Staff abilities by 3/5%.
